name: Samtub007's Bubble Clicker Game
description:
"Samtub007's Bubble Clicker Game" is a simple, mouse only clicker game created by Samtube007 (me) where you point your mouse (your mouse will be a red dot) at any of the bubbles displayed on the screen and click to pop the bubble and gain a point (you will see how much points you have between the bottom left and centre left of the screen). This game can be used for practicing hand-eye coordination, practicing reaction time, do something while your bored or getting used to a new sensitivity for your mouse.
